title: Compile error 'failed to get layout for'

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
### Code It's not failing in my project, but a dependency (but rocket). ### Meta Fails the same in two environments: ``` rustc 1.68.0-nightly (9c07efe84 2022-12-16) running on aarch64-apple-darwin compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental=[REDACTED] ``` AND ``` rustc 1.68.0-nightly (9c07efe84 2022-12-16) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental=[REDACTED] ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling rocket_cors v0.6.0-alpha1 (https://github.com/lawliet89/rocket_cors?branch=master#c17e8145) error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_codegen_llvm/src/context.rs:969:13: failed to get layout for `&mut Pin<&mut rocket::http::hyper::server::shutdown::Graceful>, service::make::MakeServiceFn<[closure@rocket::server::>::http_server::{closure#0}::{closure#2}]>, rocket::Shutdown, hyper::common::exec::Exec>>`: unable to determine layout for `&mut Pin<&mut rocket::http::hyper::server::shutdown::Graceful>, service::make::MakeServiceFn<[closure@rocket::server::>::http_server::{closure#0}::{closure#2}]>, rocket::Shutdown, hyper::common::exec::Exec>>` because `&mut Pin<&mut rocket::http::hyper::server::shutdown::Graceful>, service::make::MakeServiceFn<[closure@rocket::server::>::http_server::{closure#0}::{closure#2}]>, rocket::Shutdown, hyper::common::exec::Exec>>` cannot be normalized thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/9c07efe84f28a44f3044237696acc295aa407ee5/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:973:33 stack backtrace: 0: 0x1033ae8e4 - ::fmt::hf05b923e3705aab6 1: 0x1033ffb9c - core::fmt::write::h4d4011c40e30a20e 2: 0x1033a1ea0 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::hac39cff9713a22a8 3: 0x1033ae6f8 - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::h269f9d0fba6134d5 4: 0x1033b11a8 - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h1b64b947323e5455 5: 0x1033b0f00 - std::panicking::default_hook::hd5000a9bd64dd6fe 6: 0x10b602654 - rustc_driver[3bb78e66a26ba6d7]::DEFAULT_HOOK::{closure#0}::{closure#0} 7: 0x1033b18a0 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::ha951c23f48d097e1 8: 0x10b81bda4 - std[4a15b4f0527ee59b]::panicking::begin_panic::::{closure#0} 9: 0x10b81772c - std[4a15b4f0527ee59b]::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_end_short_backtrace::::{closure#0}, !> 10: 0x10f80f92c - std[4a15b4f0527ee59b]::panicking::begin_panic:: 11: 0x10b81759c - std[4a15b4f0527ee59b]::panic::panic_any:: 12: 0x10b80fe5c - ::span_bug:: 13: 0x10b80fa00 - ::span_bug:: 14: 0x10b73fd9c - rustc_middle[f5dd9b07379f660d]::ty::context::tls::with_context_opt::::{closure#0}, ()>::{closure#0}, ()> 15: 0x10b73fc68 - rustc_middle[f5dd9b07379f660d]::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt:: 16: 0x10f80f9a0 - rustc_middle[f5dd9b07379f660d]::util::bug::span_bug_fmt:: 17: 0x10b73b778 - ::handle_layout_err 18: 0x10b734acc - ::spanned_layout_of::{closure#0} 19: 0x10b73b0d0 - ::layout_of 20: 0x10b72fe0c - >::project_type:: 21: 0x10b807e3c - >::codegen_place 22: 0x10b7fe588 - >::codegen_rvalue_operand 23: 0x10b804748 - >::codegen_block 24: 0x10b7fb9c0 - rustc_codegen_ssa[8d103e59afe8e517]::mir::codegen_mir:: 25: 0x10b717a64 - rustc_codegen_ssa[8d103e59afe8e517]::base::codegen_instance:: 26: 0x10b7b65d8 - ::define:: 27: 0x10b821e70 - rustc_codegen_llvm[2f081aae4baaf7a2]::base::compile_codegen_unit::module_codegen 28: 0x10b780c40 - >::with_task::> 29: 0x10b826c10 - ::compile_codegen_unit 30: 0x10b717240 - rustc_codegen_ssa[8d103e59afe8e517]::base::codegen_crate:: 31: 0x10b827d9c - ::codegen_crate 32: 0x10b6793b8 - ::time::, rustc_interface[cf09683c24aec831]::passes::start_codegen::{closure#0}> 33: 0x10b6a6004 - rustc_interface[cf09683c24aec831]::passes::start_codegen 34: 0x10b6a4fec - ::enter::<::ongoing_codegen::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core[41fe635294967b39]::result::Result, rustc_errors[dfa53bcc3145749c]::ErrorGuaranteed>> 35: 0x10b6f5f84 - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::ha67a48e73a2ba1c0 41: 0x19b00c26c - __pthread_deallocate ```
